attributes.action: Bring in compulsory National Service & Community Service for Young People
attributes.additional_details:
We have rioting on the streets of England.  Those young people do not have respect for authority or for their community. How do we change that?
Compulsory National Service & Community Service for young people!
They will be made to get up early each day, present themselves smartly & do a day's work for their community.
They will learn how to take responsibility for themselves, to act together for good not against their community.
They will be doing something for their community but also for their country. They need to do this to develop a sense of Nationhood.
The government trialled this idea with the army in one area of England in the early 90's but dropped it.
Maybe things would be different now if they had rolled it out nationally!
Add your name to this petition and let's change the future of this country! Thank you.
